constants.name: edge_transport
constants.header: Translation table for different types of transport coefficients.

int.name: combined
int.description: Combination of data from all available transport models

int.name: combined_radial
int.description: Combination of data from all available radial transport models

int.name: database_radial
int.description: Radial transport specified by a database entry

int.name: prescribed_radial
int.description: Radial transport model prescribed from code input parameters

int.name: combined_parallel
int.description: Combination of data from all available radial transport models

int.name: database_parallel
int.description: Radial transport specified by a database entry

int.name: prescribed_parallel
int.description: Radial transport model prescribed from code input parameters
